definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system

sentences.english: Just slowly sip a glass of flat coke and it should help to alleviate nausea.
sentences.chinese: 慢慢呷完一满杯可乐，对缓解反胃有很大帮助。

sentences.english: Feedings should be frequent but not too much as to cause regurgitation.
sentences.chinese: 进食应该少吃多餐以防引起反胃。

sentences.english: Chocolate is also high in cocoa, and cocoa causes reflux.
sentences.chinese: 巧克力还是高可可含量，可可也会引起反胃。

sentences.english: Peppermint is frequently used to allay nausea and vomiting and will relieve the pain of colic.
sentences.chinese: 欧薄荷常被用作缓和反胃和呕吐，亦舒缓绞痛。

sentences.english: You might feel queasy or nauseous.
Neither rabbits nor guinea pigs can vomit either.
sentences.chinese: 兔子与豚鼠也不能反胃。

sentences.english: Those motion-sickness patches can really help calm a churning stomach on a boat.
sentences.chinese: 那些晕船类的贴片真的能帮助你在船上不反胃恶心。

sentences.english: Bananas will settle an upset stomach. Ginger will cure morning sickness and nausea.
sentences.chinese: 香蕉可以缓解胃痛，而生姜则可医治晨吐及反胃。

sentences.english: But liberal-minded figures in the Zatlers party will be queasy about that.
sentences.chinese: 但扎特莱尔斯政党中的自由意志者会感到反胃。

sentences.english: The stomach-churning finding is not the first to be exposed in the area.
sentences.chinese: 这样令人反胃的发现在当地并非第一次。

sentences.english: Symptoms include pain, nausea, and clay-coloured stools.
sentences.chinese: 其症状包括疼痛，反胃和泥土色的大便。

sentences.english: You might suddenly feel light headcahe, you lightheaded . You might also feel sick to your stomach.
sentences.chinese: 你会突然感觉到头昏眼花，或者感觉到反胃。

sentences.english: Soda and other carbonated beverages are some of the main causes of acid reflux.
sentences.chinese: 汽水和其它的碳酸饮料是导致反胃的一大原因。

sentences.english: Sugar becomes cloying; processed industrial vegetable oil tastes unnatural.
sentences.chinese: 糖变得反胃，精加工的植物油尝起来非自然。

sentences.english: On the other hand, your stomach would turn at the idea of frying potatoes in animal fat.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，你一想到荤油炸土豆就会反胃。

sentences.english: Chocolate is high in fat, and fat causes reflux.
sentences.chinese: 巧克力是高脂肪食物，脂肪又会引起反胃。

definition: to feel sick/to feel nauseous/to feel disgusted
variant of 惡心|恶心[e3 xin1]
